title: jubeat Soundtrack
description:
This is a compilation of the songs used in the arcade video game "jubeat".

Jubeat is a relatively new rhythm game from the same company that brought you Dance Dance Revolution, but while DDR is played with your feet, jubeat is played with your hands, tapping a grid of sixteen panels that light up in time to the music.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jubeat

Most of these tracks are high quality audio. A couple are audio rips from videos of people playing the game, because the original music composed for the game hasn't yet been released on CD.
